course_title: Advanced Designing and Implementing EPI Studies
class_notes: This is an online synchronous course.  Second-year students or first -year students with permission of instructor.  Students may only enroll for a grade; no S/U or audit status permitted.
course_description: The primary objective of this course is to gain advanced knowledge and skills in designing and implementing epidemiologic studies. The emphasis is on building the skills and knowledge needed to develop and conduct studies of primary data analyses. The course is geared toward students aspiring to become principal investigators or research project managers, or who desire the knowledge of how to design and carry out rigorous observational studies and randomized, controlled intervention trials.
sections: Class Nbr: 4689, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: Th 1-2:50p, Instructor: R. Bostick, Status: Open
